Package gov.usgs.anss.util

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    LoggerInterface
    Classes implementing this interface can register with EdgeThread or Util to use the same log file
    StatusInfo
    StatusInfo.java Created on December 21, 2003, 2:39 PM A status info like ProcessStatus or ChannelStatus implements this interface so that it can be used as the data storage portion of a UdpProcess.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AB95  
    AnssPorts
    AnssPorts.java - this class contains public static ints for various ports used in the ANSS system.
    ChangeCopyright  
    ClientSocket
    ClientSocket.java This represent one end of a socket.
    Complex  
    ConnectionStatus
    The ConnectionStatus contains one group of information from the UDP channel system plus data derived for successive updates of this data.
    DBObjectOld
    This routine basically forms an object wrapping a ResultSet for one record from a JDBC table.
    Delaz
    Another implementation of Delaz!
    Distaz
    The author of theses routines is largely unknown, though I think H.
    ErrorTrack
    This class helps with creating a "error" variable which is used in "chk***()" routines from FUtil.
    EtcHosts
    read in the /etc/hosts file and return answers about it.
    FormUDP
    FormUDP.java - This class allows communications of tag-value pairs over a TCP/IP socket to the VMS systems.
    FreeSpace  
    FUtil
    All methods in this class are static so no instances of FUtil are allowed This is a helper class for fields represented as "JTextFields" that need to represent numbers, dates, and other "verifiable" things.
    GombergPacket
    GombergPacket.java This object is designed to represent a USNSN gomberg packet (communications packet).
    GombergSocket
    This class extends the standard ServerSocket to packetize the stream of bytes according to GombergPacket rules.
    JDBConnectionOld
    This is a static holder for JDBC connections to the MySQL database.
    jmdget
    This class is a java version of the mdget C program for use on Windows and other non-*nix systems.
    KMLReport  
    LeapSecondDay
    This class keeps track of the julian days of the leap seconds and the total of the leap seconds.
    LoggingStream
    Simple utility for testing program output.
    NetStationLocationChannelComparator
    StationComponentComparator.java = for Display implement a ordering by station/component.
    NsnTime
    Encapsulate an NSN time code in both communications buffer and decoded form
    PeakFinder
    This class was written for H.
    PNZ
    This class is used to represent a Poles and Zeros as commonly used in seismology.
    PostScript
    This class provides static methods to assist in creating PostScript and EPS output.
    ProcessStatus
    ProcessStatus.java - contains messages in both raw and decoded form for the UDP status packets.
    QueryOld
    This can be used to manage a result set from a SQL query.
    Report
    Report.java - Data base access to the reports which basically is a title and the SQL query to generate a report.
    RSFieldsOld
    This contains the information about the fields in a resultSet.
    RTSCommand
    RTSCommand.java contains the knowledge of how to build command buffers for the RTS SocketServer.
    RTSConfigUDP  
    RTSUtilityCommand
    RTSUtilityCommand.java - creates a thread which attempts to keep a socket connected to an IP address passed at creation.
    SEEDNameTypeBox
    This is a JComboBox that displays a list of SEED names and types retrieved from a database connection.
    SEEDNameTypeBox.SEEDNameType
    This is a simple container for a SEED name and a type so they can be stored together in a SEEDNameTypeBox.
    SeedUtil
    This class is all static methods for manipulating julian days, day-of-year, back and forth.
    Show
    Show.java Tool for displaying Swing demos.
    SimpleSMTPThread
    simpleSMTP.java - This class is used to send a simple mail message (no attachments, etc.
    SQLReportParser  
    StaSrv
    This class uses the Stasrv service (originally on neisa, nsn8) to retrieve metadata from the server.
    StationComponentComparator
    StationComponentComparator.java = for Display implement a ordering by station/component.
    Subprocess
    This class really wraps the Process class providing simple err and output processing.
    TextStatusClient  
    UC
    This class holds constants and other (mostly) static data.
    User
    This class encapsulate the notion of a user of the system per the inventory system.
    UserPropertiesPanel
    UserPropertiesPanel.java - Implements a GUI for updating a set of user Properties.
    USGSPropertyFixer  
    Util  
    XMLCompare
